message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $20,000. I believe it holds significant value that will benefit you greatly.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. Could we possibly meet in the middle?
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your position, but $20,000 is already a very competitive price.  Could you meet me at $17,000?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, given my budget constraints, I can't go above $10,000 for this product. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
